artifacts.title: Smarter Threat Tracking and Prediction
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Mission Operators**, 

- *We need* tools that combine smart learning (like AI) with proven rules to better track and predict threats 
- *So that* we can handle tough conditions like desert interference and quickly spot dangers.
artifacts.owner: Air Force and Air Defence Commander
artifacts.rationale: Simplifies complex tracking for operators, extending TRP1's sensor integrations (Section 11.0).

artifacts.title: Flexible Control Over AI Actions
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Enterprise Commanders**, 

- *We need* options to choose how much AI helps with planning, detecting, deciding, and acting 
- *So that* we keep safe control during operations and build trust in the system.
artifacts.rationale: Allows gradual AI adoption, supporting TRP1's security controls (Section 3.0).

artifacts.title: Easy Ways to Add and Update AI Tools
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Technical Specialists**, 

- *We need* standard ways to bring in and update new AI features from different sources 
- *So that* we can keep the system modern without big disruptions.
artifacts.rationale: Promotes flexibility, aligning with TRP1's modular goals (Introduction, Page 6).

artifacts.title: Safe Process for Training and Rolling Out AI Changes
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Technical Specialists**, 

- *We need* a step-by-step process to store data, train AI offline, test it safely, and roll it out gradually 
- *So that* we can improve the system without risking operations.
artifacts.rationale: Ensures reliable updates, building on TRP1's DevOps (Section 8.3).

artifacts.title: Hybrid AI Algorithm Integration for Enhanced C2 Functions
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Mission Operators**, 

- *We need* hybrid algorithmic approaches blending neural networks and physics-based models for key functions like tracking, correlation, and engagement prediction 
- *So that* we can achieve reliable performance in challenging environments, such as desert radar clutter and multipath, while implementing AIC2 for decision superiority.
artifacts.owner: Air Force and Air Defence Commander
artifacts.rationale: Enables AFAD to leverage adaptive AI for dynamic threats while ensuring deterministic accuracy, building on TRP1's AI/ML preparations (Introduction, Page 6).

artifacts.title: Graduated Autonomy for OODA Loop Execution
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Enterprise Commanders**, 

- *We need* configurable levels of autonomy across planning, detection, COA development, and execution to balance human oversight with AI automation 
- *So that* we can safely implement AIC2, ensuring ethical and operational control in multi-domain scenarios.
artifacts.rationale: Supports AFAD's enterprise-wide implementation by providing safeguards for high-stakes decisions, aligning with TRP1's cybersecurity frameworks (Section 3.0).

artifacts.title: Open Standards-Based AI Model Integration
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Technical Specialists**, 

- *We need* adoption of open standards (e.g., ONNX, MLflow) for training, integrating, and updating third-party AI models, LLMs, and agents 
- *So that* we can evolve AIC2 modularly without vendor lock-in, facilitating continuous improvements.
artifacts.rationale: Enables technical implementation of MOSA-compliant AI, extending TRP1's modular architecture (Introduction, Page 6) for future-proofing.

artifacts.title: MLOps Pipelines for Secure Model Lifecycle
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Technical Specialists**, 

- *We need* robust MLOps pipelines for data storage, offline training, back-testing, approval, and graduated deployment (shadow, A/B, live) 
- *So that* we can implement ethical AI updates in AIC2 while maintaining operational integrity and compliance.
artifacts.rationale: Provides secure, controlled processes for AI evolution, building on TRP1's DevOps platform (Section 8.3) and aligning with Responsible AI principles.
